Campus Learning Environments     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Campus Learning Environments      Campus Learning Environments   Main Menu    Classrooms           Upcoming Projects    Completed Projects    Learning Space Design Standards         Oasis           Giving to Project Oasis    Current Projects    Proposed Projects    List of Oases and Learning Centers    Project Oasis Guidelines    Oasis Use Policy    Video Contest Winners         Active Learning           Active Learning Spaces at UIC         Assessment    Advisory Board    Contact     Eyebrow menu    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     Project Oasis      View Menu            The Project Oasis program was created to provide students with places to interact, study, and gather between classes and during extended breaks. Since 2003, the program has transformed more than 50 underutilized areas on campus into comfortable and supportive learning environments. These informal learning spaces were designed and renovated with an emphasis on improving lighting, acoustics, and ergonomics. In addition to providing new, contemporary furniture and finishes, each Oasis is adorned with artwork created by UIC Art and Design students and alumni.
